criteria.question: Is the company involved at all in the exploration or extraction of fossil fuels?
Does the company own or operate fossil fuel power generators, or retail fossil fuel-generated electricity?
Does the company provide specific and significant services to the fossil fuel industry - including engineering, financing, transport or logistics?
Is the continued viability of the business dependent on the continuation of the fossil fuel industry?
Does the company’s operations have a direct negative impact on recognised UNESCO World Heritage areas or High Conservation value areas?
Does the company have a recent history of human or labour rights violations?
Has the company taken swift and appropriate action when alerted to reports of labour exploitation in their business or supply chain?
Does the company profit from addiction to gambling?
examples: Aristocrat Leisure (ownership of poker machines and casinos)

criteria.question: Does the company provide significant services to the gambling industry?
Does the company have at least one woman on their board of directors?
Does the company provide services to the mandatory detention of asylum seekers, such as the provision of security, infrastructure or transportation of asylum seekers?
Does the company profit from or own for-profit prisons?
examples: GEO Group (prison and detention centre operator)

criteria.question: Does the company manufacture, produce or engineer weapons or armaments?
Does the company provide specific and significant services to military forces?
Does the company farm for animal protein or provide significant services to the industry?
Does the company engage in or provide significant services to the live export industry?
Does the company conduct animal testing for cosmetic purposes?
Does the company produce controversial animal products (e.g foie gras; ivory)?
Does the company produce or manufacture tobacco or tobacco products?
Does the company provide significant services to the tobacco industry?
Does the company mine radioactive materials?
Does the company produce nuclear energy or provide specific and significant services to the nuclear energy industry.
Does the company derive significant revenue from the production, distribution or sale of alcohol?
Does the company manufacture, distribute or sell foods that have high fat, salt, sugar and oil content without providing nutritional value?

Does the company use toxic chemicals in the extraction or mining of minerals and metals?
